definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Though the flower dies if plucked.
Flowers will fade, grass will wither, but love endures.
sentences.chinese: 花會凋謝，草會幹黃，惟有愛是永不衰殘。

sentences.english: Dating costs a lot of money, laying a huge financial burden on families.
sentences.chinese: 談戀愛花會花很多錢，給家庭帶來經濟負擔。

sentences.english: Folk Hua-hui is the special living space in the folk sports.
sentences.chinese: 民間花會是民間體育特殊的生存空間。

sentences.english: Flower fade and fruit of summer fade.
sentences.chinese: 花會凋謝，盛夏的果實會枯萎。

sentences.english: She knew Lee was a threat.
sentences.chinese: 她知道李相花會對她產生威脅。

sentences.english: These blossoms produce cranberry-sized coffee cherries.
sentences.chinese: 這些花會結出越桔狀的咖啡果。

sentences.english: This has greatly influenced the folk sports' survival and development.
sentences.chinese: 極大地影響了花會中民間體育的生存與發展。

sentences.english: We're hoping the flowers will bloom this spring and make the school look beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望今年春天這些花會開，把學校裝點得更美麗。

definition: a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home/In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
everything in the garden is lovely
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
lit. a pair of birds flying close together (idiom)/fig. two hearts beating as one/name of a sweet and sour chicken wing dish
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
